subject: Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Marat Safin and Marcos Baghdatis both have very fond memories of playing at Rod Laver Arena.  But this year’s memory will belong to Baghdatis, who defeated Safin to advance to the third round.
snippet: Marat Safin and Marcos Baghdatis both have very fond memories of playing at Rod Laver Arena.  But this year’s memory will belong to Baghdatis, who defeated Safin to advance to the third round.
